data.text:
Home

Sam is haunted by a vision of a woman trapped in the brothers' childhood house and convinces a reluctant Dean that they need to go home.

Soul

The team investigates the 1970 murder of a musician who kept his involvement with Philadelphia's music scene a secret from his strict preacher father; Lilly meets her teenage stepbrother.

Original Song

With Sue Sylvester coaching Aural Intensity, Blaine and the Warblersâ dynamic set list and tough judges Tammy Jean Albertson (guest star Kathy Griffin) and Sister Mary Constance (guest star Loretta Devine), the kids of New Directions decide the only way to win Regionals is to write and perform their own original songs. Meanwhile, Quinn is hell-bent on getting Finn back and ruling McKinley once again. Musical performances include âBlackbirdâ, âCandlesâ, âGet It Rightâ, âHell To the Noâ, âJesus Is A Friend of Mineâ, âLoser Like Meâ, âMiseryâ and âRaise Your Glassâ.
